author: Zusha Elinson
title: So-Called Golden State Killer Captured, Authorities Say
text:
SAN FRANCISCOâ€”For more than 40 years, the unsolved crimes of the so-called Golden State Killer haunted California, his trail of killings and rapes bedeviling police and terrifying communities. Authorities said Wednesday they have solved the case.
Joseph James DeAngelo, a 72-year-old former police officer who officials say is responsible for 12 homicides and 45 rapes throughout California since the 1970s, was arrested Tuesday. He was taken into custody at his home in Citrus Heights, Calif., a suburb of Sacramento, the city...
